title: Classic Soul -
content:
Greetings fellow designers. I am a grad student at SCAD and this project we were charge with designing a typeface from some rubbing in a graveyard tombstones. I took the part I like design wise and created this typeface. All comments are greatly appreciated. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CLASSICSOUL.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419055020/http:/typophile.com/files/CLASSICSOUL.pdf) | 189.83 KB |
author: dantefillyau

comments.content:
This is starting to seem like no graveyard I've ever been to.

What's with the notch in the I? The font is certainly fun to look at.
A graveyard? How about a neighborhood bar? That's what this feels like to me.
